placeholder.flushMsgs: flush all waiting messages if property is equal value
placeholder.dropMsgs: drop all waiting messages if property is equal value
placeholder.ctrlPropSet: set a control propertie to the speciefied value

tips.controlMsgProp: Here can be defined special properties of the input message to flush or drop queued messages.
tips.controlMsgPropDefined: If one of the control propeties are equal to the value, all messages will be dropped or flushed from the queue. If the message contains additional the property msg.enqueue the message will be stored. Wit the following the control property can be set in that case to another value.
